attributes.name: AWS Configuration Recorder Stopped v101.0.1
attributes.description: Identifies an AWS configuration change to stop recording a designated set of resources.
author: Elastic
false_positives: Verify whether the user identity, user agent, and/or hostname should be making changes in your environment. Recording changes from unfamiliar users or hosts should be investigated. If known behavior is causing false positives, it can be exempted from the rule.
attributes.query: event.dataset:aws.cloudtrail and event.provider:config.amazonaws.com and event.action:StopConfigurationRecorder and event.outcome:success
attributes.setup: The AWS Fleet integration, Filebeat module, or similarly structured data is required to be compatible with this rule.
